--- named_schemas_drop_view.sql
-- TODO: CREATE VIEW not yet supported, this file is placeholder.
-- DROP VIEW sch1.SingerView
CREATE VIEW Dummy SQL SECURITY INVOKER AS (SELECT 1)
--- AST
&ast.CreateView{
  Create: 95,
  Name:   &ast.Path{
    Idents: []*ast.Ident{
      &ast.Ident{
        NamePos: 107,
        NameEnd: 112,
        Name:    "Dummy",
      },
    },
  },
  OrReplace:    false,
  SecurityType: "INVOKER",
  Query:        &ast.SubQuery{
    Lparen: 137,
    Rparen: 146,
    Query:  &ast.Select{
      Select:   138,
      Distinct: false,
      As:       nil,
      Results:  []ast.SelectItem{
        &ast.ExprSelectItem{
          Expr: &ast.IntLiteral{
            ValuePos: 145,
            ValueEnd: 146,
            Base:     10,
            Value:    "1",
          },
        },
      },
      From:    (*ast.From)(nil),
      Where:   (*ast.Where)(nil),
      GroupBy: (*ast.GroupBy)(nil),
      Having:  (*ast.Having)(nil),
      OrderBy: (*ast.OrderBy)(nil),
      Limit:   (*ast.Limit)(nil),
    },
    OrderBy: (*ast.OrderBy)(nil),
    Limit:   (*ast.Limit)(nil),
  },
}

--- SQL
CREATE VIEW Dummy SQL SECURITY INVOKER AS (SELECT 1)
